Introduction
This topic contains information on the PMR retrieval program, including
purpose of the PMR Program
PMR contractor responsibilities
medical releases not processed by PMR contractor
RO leadership responsibilities
PMR Super Users
uploading
VA Forms 21-4142
and
21-4142a
via QuickSubmit
PMR Retrieval Program Tracked Items
, and
requests rejected by the PMR contractor
.
title: M21-1, Part III, Subpart ii, Chapter 3 - Requesting Evidence From Private Health Providers (PHPs)
citation: Part III, Subpart ii, Chapter 3, Section None
